name: Branded in White
text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material, including a Dragon monster. If you use "Fallen of Albaz" as Fusion Material, you can also banish monsters from your GY as Fusion Material. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn to activate the effect of "Fallen of Albaz": You can Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Stigmatika of White" once per turn.
